reviews.review_msg: Doug is a fantastic lecturer who keeps the great wealth and variety of material in the survey course bearable with good humour and

Doug is an amazing prof! He's really funny and really easy to talk to. He doesn't act like he's superior to the rest of the class. The assignments were interesting and the TA was really nice! The marking was fair and overall I really enjoyed the class. I would definitely recommend Doug as a prof!

dennis was a good lecturer and is a pretty funny guy, however he is very arrogant and seems checked out. I want to like him but he needs to put some effort into the course, he doesn't really care about his students.

Dennis is great, he cares about his students and has a good sense of humour. Once you understand how he tests you'll know how to study, just put in the work and you'll be fine. He also let me do my final by distance.

Lectures are very easy to follow and full of interesting content. Exams are very related to the lectures and are easy to guess what the main points are for the essay questions.I didn't find a lot of need for the textbook other than supplementary knowledge. Assignments were also straightforward and always found him available for questions.

Dennis is one of the most helpful professors I have ever had and I have been in school for a long time. He is kind, funny, respectful, and clearly passionate about the course content. I have taken both 131 and 272 with him and whenever I reached out in both courses he went out of his way to help me out.

I am still a little put off how Dennis did not do any meeting activities at the start of the semester. ARCH272 had around 25 students in the class (small) and never once did he initiate meeting each other or getting to know each other. Made it VERY awkward the whole semester. Never tried to know our names. Super strange to me. Exams are all writing

Perhaps once this prof was passionate and articulate like I hear some people describe her as, however for the past couple years the only term applied to her is "scattered". Dates are often wrong and contradictory on slides, she consistently forgets deadlines, and due to her rambling the class moves at a snail's pace through exceedingly dry material
The best prof ever!

She may be really nice but shes really not a very interesting lecturer.  Tests are tough but if you study you should do fine.  But if you want to stay awake during class take this course with a different prof.

Her material is interesting, yet she neither detracts from its appeal nor adds to it. Seeing her about your essay will get you a "you're on the right track" and not much else. She seems nice enough, though.
Very dry lectures. Not too hard though. And shes extremely nice if talking one on one. A shame the classes were so monotonous
Super nice and helpful.  Very clear and put together lectures, power point was awesome!   Easy to follow and open to helping as much as she could!  Rad Prof!

Brutal exams; matching questions are tricky - study lots.  Lectures aren't exciting, no class interaction.  Overall, a very nice instructor. Take a course with her in a subject that you're interested in and she's interested in - Egypt/Africa.
Great instructor. Very helpful and willing to talk and provide direction.
An OK prof. The multiple choice section of her exams were brutal. The only thing that salvaged my mark was my term paper.
HARD exams!!! However, she's a good instructor and knows her stuff.
Good Professor.  If you have an interest in what she is teaching than she is interesting.  Has an interest in what she teaches, this is very important to me.
Excellent teacher. Extremely intersted in helping undergraduates.
I hear she's not bad in other courses but do not take 272 with her!
perfectly mediochre in every way
She's not that bad, she really knows her stuff and that's important!
Hard marker, unclear lectures-to fast, too much material.
Terrible, Unhelpful, always off topic, too much material for course

His lectures are extremely helpful and relevant to the textbook. The films he showed to the class is also very clear on the topics and he makes sure we know what he expects for the exam (one MT). His assignments are not hard to do and the final assignment is so easy, it's a blast!

He has a massive ego. yes it's true, in the archaeological world he is considered amazing at what he does. His experience is phenomenal but don't bother going to him for help outside of class he'll trivialize what you do and what you ask, and his answers are always unclear because his attitude makes you not want to ask him anything else.
